txt.en:
'The depths, both of the lake and the tombs, contain many things we do not yet understand. These creatures now roaming the Way of Kings are one such example of that.

'We call them kergrim, but are not sure what they are, other than that they feed upon the remains of the dead. I do not know if they are lizard, twisted men, or something else, something more ancient and foul. What I do know, is they are very territorial and hostile, and they stand between us and the tombs.

'They must be cleared out if we are to advance further. Head into the Way of Kings and defeat several of them so we can advance.'
'Good! Perhaps that will get us a little more room to explore within the area.'
'Eventually, we may learn what these beasts are, but for now all I need to know is that they will kill if given the chance.'
Kergrim, creatures from the depths of the waters and tombs, have begun to spread into the Way of Kings.
